text:
If you want to watch cricket, sitting in the stadium among the crowd is the best place to be. With the noise & clapping, the atmosphere is electric. 
Have been in the crowd all my life, thats where the fun is, so why change now.
author: ArifAlvi

text: کرائسٹ چرچ مسجد میں حملے کی خبر حیران کن اور رنجیدہ کرنیوالی ہے۔ اس حملے کے نتیجے میں جن لوگوں کی جانیں گئیں اللہ ان لوگوں کو جنت میں جگہ دے۔ میری دعائیں متاثرہ خاندانوں کے ساتھ ہیں اللہ انہیں یہ صدمہ برداشت کرنے کی ہمت دے۔ نفرت کا آغاز کرنے کے بعد اسکا اختتام بہت مشکل ہے

text: Shocked and grieved to learn about the horrific massacre in Christchurch Mosque. My prayers for the victims. May their souls rest in peace. My condolences to the families. I pray they have strength to bear this loss. Hate, once unleashed is difficult to stop. Difficult times.
author: ArifAlvi

text: I cannot even imagine to share the sorrow of Amal's family.May Allah give them the strength to bear this loss with fortitude. However I have requested some MPAs to see why hospitals do not take care of trauma victims & turn them away. Amal is gone but we can save many other lives
author: ArifAlvi

text: Success breeds success. After the Billion Tree Tsunami, we Pakistanis must reach the 10 Billion Tree Plantation target IA in the next five years. Every one must play his or her part. To be a great nation and a great people we have to do great things

text: You certainly deserve to represent my Constituency #NA247 Have had nothing but love from my voters.Made promises that we will leave no stone unturned to solve their problem & I trust that you will do justice. Water, Load Shedding, Roads, Garbage, Sewage & many more. I will help

text:
The Constitution says:
Art 43. (1) The President shall not hold any office of profit in the service of Pakistan or occupy any other position carrying the right to remuneration for the rendering of services.
So will not practice anyway as I intend to serve.
author: ArifAlvi

text: Just managed to hold back my tears today when I met son of Capt Tauqeer who was born 2 months after his father's Shahadat. He never saw his father nor the father saw his boy. He is now 28, BEng & looking for a job. Will request relevant people in our govt to take care of our own
author: ArifAlvi

text: Thank you Shah Sahib. We all have high hopes in our new government and a lot depends on our foreign policy of peace with dignity which you are leading as a part of your contribution to Pakistan
author: ArifAlvi

text:
President-elect Arif Alvi to seek immunity in criminal case
 https://www.dawn.com/news/1431254  
Aw Come on. I don't intend to. The accused in this case are also my PM @ImranKhanPTI and Ministers @Shafqat_Mahmood @Asad_Umar and @SMQureshiPTI How can I seek immunity? Will consult my lawyers

text: Have requested my office to make arrangements so that I may have the honour to visit the family of a Shaheed today
author: ArifAlvi

text: My dear friends tell me in their kindness, that my election as President is due reward for my long struggle. My heart says & God knows that my efforts were not for any personal reward but for our people in misery. IA this govt with help from the citizens of Pakistan will deliver
author: ArifAlvi

text: Today I honour the brave soldiers of Pakistan and the martyrs who laid down their lives so that we could live and prosper. I condole with their families, specially the children who were deprived of their love but I do promise that they have our continuous support & prayers
author: ArifAlvi

text:
It has been a long and arduous journey. A determined struggle for the people of Pakistan under the able leadership of the one and only @ImranKhanPTI. 
I thank you Mr Prime Minister, the nation thanks you, and I am sure there will be a time that the Muslim World will thank you
author: ArifAlvi

text: It is difficult even to read 1000s of messages that have poured in. But will read every one of them as  they r an expression of hope as well. I continue to thank you & assure you that all my colleagues in the govt of PM @ImranKhanPTI will work to fulfil your dream of NayaPakistan
author: ArifAlvi

text: Thank you. I agree, the poor should be those who matter most in our new government
author: ArifAlvi

text: Thank you my friend. The onus on  all of us Minister Sahib is too big and I pray to Allah that our government succeeds
author: ArifAlvi

text: Thank you Qadri Sahib
author: ArifAlvi

text: Thank you my friend
author: ArifAlvi

text: I am grateful to Allah for all that he has bestowed upon me.This is not my victory alone but that of the downtrodden masses of Pakistan.I thank @ImranKhanPTI as because of him we are on the brink of fulfilling our destiny. I also thank all who have congratulated me on my election
author: ArifAlvi

text: Klasra Sahib, Chairman PAC position is traditionally held by Leader of the Opposition so that they can keep an eye on the functioning of the government. However there is a lot that can be done as President. There are many causes in Pakistan that need to be pushed very diligently
